changeSet.author: jsimplerag
changeSet.comment: Remove peso_total_check constraint from library table. Weight validation is now handled in Java code (Library.validateWeights() method with @PrePersist and @PreUpdate), providing better flexibility and error messages.
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE library DROP CONSTRAINT IF EXISTS peso_total_check;

rollback.sql: ALTER TABLE library ADD CONSTRAINT peso_total_check CHECK (peso_semantico + peso_textual = 1.0);
